snippet: A bipartisan committee of lawmakers signed off Monday on a $160 billion plan to deal with the state’s underfunded public pension crisis.
abstract: Bipartisan committee of Illinois lawmakers approves $160 billion plan to deal to resolve state's underfunded public pension crisis, sending the measure to the House and Senate for consideration.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan committee of lawmakers signed off Monday on a $160 billion plan to deal with the state’s underfunded public pension crisis.
